code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: shows a heterogeneously enhancing proximal jejunal mass with central calcifications

observation.value: shows a heterogeneously enhancing proximal jejunal mass with central calcifications

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate lower abdominal pain, moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain, Cancer x 5 weeks. patient also reports chronic moderate diarrhea. patient is a 47 year old white M technologist. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 163 cm, Weight 57.7 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:pt presents with progressive moderate diarrhea, moderate lower abdominal pain and moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain for past 10 days. he is a white m technologist aged 47 ys. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 57.8 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus.

s:patient reports moderate diarrhea, moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain. Also complains of moderate lower abdominal pain from time to time. pt is a 48 year old m. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 162 cm, Weight 56.5 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

td.content: s:a male aged 48 Ys presents with 4 months history of moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain, moderate diarrhea and moderate lower abdominal pain. denies any smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 162 cm, Weight 55.9 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered CT Small Bowel, 5-HIAA, 24hr U, serotonin.
